plugin.title: Is It Up?
plugin.author: Zachary David Saunders

authors.name: Zachary David Saunders
authors.bio: Since most of my professional work is classified (not held in git), this profile is a graveyard of half-baked ideas and Frankenstein'd projects.

plugin.desc: A MacOs Menu Bar (BitBar) plugin that allows you to check whether or not a website is currently up (online).
